Translations.Text: punarut'thana dina, tanna mukhavannu a ketta sikseyinda raksisalu henaguttiruvavanu (svargavasigalige samananagaballane)? Andu akramigalodane ‘‘saviyiri, nivu maduttidda karmagala phalavannu’’ ennalaguvudu
avariginta hindinavaru (satyavannu) tiraskarisiddaru. Konege avarige arive illadante, avara mele sikseyu banderagitu
allahanu i lokada badukinalle avarige nastada ruciyannu unisidanu. Innu paralokada sikseyantu idakkinta tumba doddadagiruvudu. Avaru idannu aritirabekittu
khanditavagiyu navu i kur‌an‌nalli manavarigagi ella bageya udaharanegalannu mundittiruvevu – avaru upadesavannu svikarisabekendu
arabi bhaseyalliruva, yava vakrateyu illada kur‌an. Avaru dharmanistharagabekendu (idannu kaluhisalagide)

allahanu ondu udaharaneyannu mundiduttane: Obbanu parasparara palige tira hathamarigalagiruva halavara dasanagiddane mattu innobbanu kevala obbana dasanagiddane. Avaribbara sthitiyu samanavagiralu sadhyave? Allahanige stutigalu. Adare, heccinavaru aritilla
(dutare,) nivu khandita sayuviri mattu avaru (virodhigalu) khandita sayuvaru
mattu nivu (virodhigalu) punarut'thanadina nim'ma odeyana munde khandita paraspara jagaladuviri. Kanda –
Allahana mele sullaropa horisida hagu satyavu tanna balige bandaga adannu tiraskarisidavaniginta dodda akrami yaru? Dhikkarigala nele iruvudu narakadalle tane
satyavannu tandavanu mattu adannu samarthisidavanu – avare dharmanistharu
